name: Doors and Switches
description:
WASD = Navigate E = Put/Take Sphere

My own submission for NOKIA 3310 JAM 3!
https://itch.io/jam/nokiajam3

A short puzzle game where you collect spheres in order to advance.  You can put the spheres you collected on pedestals to open the doors, or take them off to close them.

This is actually my first game jam, so I decided to make a 3d game, because I have more experience with it, and also because I'm really terrible at drawing pixel art.

Since the theme is "ON / OFF", I made a puzzle game where you can open and close doors using switches. I had many more mechanics I wanted to add, like moving platforms or enemies, or even just more puzzles, but I didn't manage to add more in a single week.

The game follows all the restrictions about Palette, Resolution, Game Engine, Sound and Controls.

Credits:

Made with Unreal Engine 4
https://www.unrealengine.com/
3D assets by Quaternius
http://quaternius.com
Sounds by Trix
